title: Room for discussion: productivity
brief_description: One of a series of films designed for the general public on the subject of industrial productivity. A panel consisting of a leading British economist, a managing director of a large industrial organisation, a prominent trade unionist and a member of the British Productivity Council answer questions and discuss problems put to them by an invited audience representing the general public.
